publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3628# Mr John Home Robertson: Edinburgh Direct Aidâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the charity group Edinburgh Direct Aid on its many years of providing aid throughout the states of the former Yugoslavia and Albania, and applauds its decision to seek to provide aid to the Palestinian people during this period of heightened tension. Supported by: Pauline McNeill*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Gordon Jackson*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Mr John McAllion*, Tommy Sheridan*, Andrew Wilson*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3628# Edinburgh Direct Aid (lodged on 22 November 2002) Sarah Boyack*, Irene Oldfather*, Scott Barrie*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
